entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Rigolet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:24 AM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening then changing to a few rain showers or flurries before morning. Blowing snow late this evening and overnight. Snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 late this evening then south 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 22 this evening. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few rain showers or flurries. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or flurries ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 19 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 21. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries. Low minus 13. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Thursday 26 January 2023
